类 SongSelectionText

java.lang.Object
org.kelvinizer.menu.songselection.SongSelectionText
public class SongSelectionText extends Object
This class manages the dynamic elements and text rendering for the song selection menu. It includes the display and animation of song information, scores, and other related data. The class also manages the display of the current, next, and previous songs in the selection menu.

  • 字段概要

    DynamicMotionManager responsible for managing dynamic motion-related tasks.
    final DynamicString
    nullJacket
    DynamicString displaying a message when no jacket preview is available.

  • 字段详细资料

    • dm

      public final DynamicMotionManager dm
      DynamicMotionManager responsible for managing dynamic motion-related tasks.

    • nullJacket

      public final DynamicString nullJacket
      DynamicString displaying a message when no jacket preview is available. Positioned at (15, 760), with width 480 and height 300.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • SongSelectionText

      public SongSelectionText()
      Constructor for the SongSelectionText class. It initializes the various display elements (text and images) and adds them to the dynamic motion manager for animation.

  • 方法详细资料

    • updateSelectionStrings

      public void updateSelectionStrings(JacketMenu jm, ArrayList<Song> sd)
      Updates the song selection screen with the current song's data, including name, composer, level, difficulty, and best scores. It also updates the previous and next songs based on the current selection.
      参数:
      jm - The JacketMenu object containing the current menu state.
      sd - The list of songs to display in the selection.

    • setEndStrings

      public void setEndStrings(Song s, BufferedImage bf)
      Sets the final strings for the song selection screen, including the song name, composer, illustrator, level, and charter. It also adds the appropriate jacket image or a placeholder if no image is provided.
      参数:
      s - The Song object containing the song data.
      bf - The BufferedImage for the jacket image, or null if no image is available.

    • renderCurrent

      public void renderCurrent(Graphics2D g2d)
      Renders the current song selection display, including the song name, composer, level, best score, and additional information. It also renders the "New Song" label if applicable.
      参数:
      g2d - The Graphics2D object used for rendering.

    • renderPrevious

      public void renderPrevious(Graphics2D g2d)
      Renders the previous song's information, including the song name, level, and composer.
      参数:
      g2d - The Graphics2D object used for rendering.

    • renderNext

      public void renderNext(Graphics2D g2d)
      Renders the next song's information, including the song name, level, and composer.
      参数:
      g2d - The Graphics2D object used for rendering.
